name: Zendesk Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Zendesk Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Zendesk API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Zendesk API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiToken

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: ticket
available_options: Ticket (值: ticket) - Tickets are the means through which your end users (customers) communicate with agents in Zendesk Support
Ticket Field (值: ticketField) - Manage system and custom ticket fields

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many organizations
Get Related Data (值: getRelatedData) - Get data related to the organization

description.name: description
description.description: The first comment on the ticket
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: The first comment on the ticket | (必填项)

jsonParameters.name: jsonParameters
jsonParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: JSON Parameters | 默认值: False

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: details (值: None) - Details about the organization, such as the address
domain_names (值: None) - Comma-separated domain names associated with this organization
organizationFieldsUi (值: None) - Values of custom fields in the organization's profile
tags (值: None) - IDs of tags applied to this organization. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

additionalFieldsJson.name: additionalFieldsJson
additionalFieldsJson.description: Object of values to set as described here
additionalFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Object of values to set as described here

id.name: id
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: details (值: None) - Details about the organization, such as the address
domain_names (值: None) - Comma-separated domain names associated with this organization
organizationFieldsUi (值: None) - Values of custom fields in the organization's profile
tags (值: None) - IDs of tags applied to this organization. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

updateFieldsJson.name: updateFieldsJson
updateFieldsJson.description: Object of values to update as described here
updateFieldsJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 作用: Object of values to update as described here

ticketType.name: ticketType
ticketType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket Type | 默认值: regular | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: group (值: None) - The group to search. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
query (值: None) - Query syntax to search tickets
sortBy (值: None) - Defaults to sorting by relevance
status (值: None) - The state of the ticket

ticketFieldId.name: ticketFieldId
ticketFieldId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Ticket Field ID | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
